text: Bikramjeet Singh (born 6 May 1993 in Hoshiarpur, Punjab) is an Indian footballer who plays as a defender. ==Career== After graduating from Paldi Football Academy, Bikramjeet Singh joined I-League developmental side Pailan Arrows for the 2011–12 season. For the 2012-13 season, he went out on loan to second division side DSK Shivajians, playing in the I-League 2nd Division. ===Bharat=== In December 2014, Bikramjeet joined newly founded I-League team Bharat FC. ==International== Bikramjeet made his Indian U23 debut against Uzbekistan U23 on 27 March 2015 in a 2016 AFC U-23 qualifier in the Bangabandhu National Stadium in Bangladesh.http://www.the- afc.com/afcasfeeds?fixtureid=8826&stageid;=348&tMode;=H&view;=ajax&show;=matchsummary ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Federation Cup !colspan="2"|Durand Cup !colspan="2"|AFC !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- | rowspan="1"| Pailan Arrows |2011–12 |7||0||0||0||0||0||—||—||7||0 |- |Bharat FC |2014–15 |2||0||0||0||0||0||–||–|2||0 |- ! colspan="2" | Career total !9!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!9!!0 |} ==References== == External links == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Punjab, India Category:I-League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Indian footballers Category:Indian Arrows players Category:People from Hoshiarpur district
